app.p: It is recommended to operate and manage the above functions using the following three methods.

list-item.p: Management · Standard: Classify items according to characteristics and functions, and set management values and operational values.
Measurement / Recording: Determine what to measure, periodically measure and record the result.
Maintenance / Inspection: Establish maintenance and inspection items necessary for energy performance improvement and carry out periodic maintenance and inspection.

non-normative-example.p: In a heating facility using a heating medium such as steam, control values and standard values are set for the temperature, pressure, and amount of heat medium required, and the temperature, pressure, and amount of the heating medium to be supplied. Determine the measurement method of these values, periodically record it. Furthermore, the method of maintenance and inspection of the part involved in heat transfer including the heat transfer surface is determined, and the deposits are periodically removed based on this and the deterioration of the heat transfer performance is prevented.
